Instruction: Set the oven temperature to 300 degrees Fahrenheit (150 degrees Celsius).

Set the corned beef brisket in the center of a roasting pan. Surround the brisket with potatoes and carrots, then distribute onion and garlic on top. Sprinkle the seasoning packet over the beef, and add enough water to cover the potatoes almost completely. Cover with a lid or heavy aluminum foil.
Roast in the preheated oven until the corned beef becomes tender enough to flake apart with a fork, which typically takes about 5 to 6 hours.
